data.actual_result: The server icon becomes stuck and untappable until you hold down and reorder it again
data.expected_result: Server should pop back into place
data.short_description: Quitting and reopening Discord while reordering servers will cause the server that is currently being reordered to become stuck then unstuck
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold down a server in the server list (reordering guilds) - Quit discord while holding down - Reopen discord - Observe and interact with said server icon
